attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spitting spreads germs through the air when being spat and spreads on shoes when stood in.

This may also help start to prevent the spread of MRSA and other diseases through  our hospitals and homes.

We need to start and make a social effort to improve this once great country.

We all have a responsibility to try!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
